activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
3 Story Software is an application service provider for our customers who upload their staffing and other data (including personal information of prospective job candidates and employees) to the 3 Story Software hosted environment. Once the data is stored, our customers access our solution and their data for staffing and reporting purposes. Individuals involved in these recruitment, staffing and reporting activities interact directly with 3 Story Software’s customers, rather than with 3 Story Software. 3 Story Software is a data “processor” for our customers who operate as “controllers” of personal information. Additionally, 3 Story Software maintains personal information pertaining to persons who have submitted their personal data in order to receive information about 3 Story Software products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
